reviews.review:
Xiaomi originally introduced the first of the Mi 11 series at the tail end of 2020, bringing the phone to new markets at the start of the new year. Fast-forward to late March 2021 and we were suddenly introduced to approximately six additional members of the family, the most modest of which is the Mi 11 Lite.

Not to be confused with the Mi 11 Lite 5G ‚Äì which shares in some (but not all of its) key hardware ‚Äì the standard Mi 11 Lite is a svelte 4G-only offering that leads with its design and ...

Camera Features.Primary Camera Features: Triple Rear Camera Setup: 64MP Primary Camera (f/1.79 Aperture) + 8MP Ultra Wide Camera (f/2.2 Aperture, FOV: 119 Degree) + 5MP Tele Macro Camera

General.In The Box: Handset, Adapter, USB Type-C Cable, Type-C to 3.5mm Headphone Adapter, Soft Case, SIM Eject Tool, User Guide, Warranty Card

Other Details.Sensors: Accelerometer, Gyro Sensor, E-compass, Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, Side Fingerprint Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty for Handset and 6 Months Warranty for In the Box Accessories
